testcase.name: Add T-Shirt to Bag
testcase.system-out: Given I open the Myntra web application.....................................passed And I type and search for the "T-Shirt" product.............................passed And I select the first product..............................................passed And I select the "M" size...................................................passed And I click the "Add To Bag" button.........................................passed Then I close the current tab................................................passed And I click the bag icon....................................................passed And I take a screenshot of the selected bag.................................passed
